title: Bilawal condoles demise of Chinese ex-Premier
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 27 (APP):Chairman Pakistan Peoples Party (PPP) Bilawal Bhutto Zardari Friday expressed profound grief and sorrow over demise of the former Chinese Prime Minister, Li Keqiang.
In a condolence message, he said that Premier Li Keqiang gave great importance to the strengthening bilateral ties and cooperation between Pakistan and China.
It was the collective vision of the Pakistani and Chinese leaderships during tenure of PPP led government from 2008-2013  under the guidance of Asif Zardari that led to the realization of the China-Pakistan Economic Corridor (CPEC).
Premier Li Keqiang will be remembered by the Pakistani people as a great friend of Pakistan,  Bilawal said.
He extended condolences to the Communist Party of China, the Chinese government and people.
